entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as a house in Hogwarts that has lost 150 points and is now in last place.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as a student who is feeling ashamed of Gryffindor's loss.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as a student who is sobbing into his pillow after the loss.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as a teacher who is breathing heavily and scolding Gryffindor students.

entities.name: house cup
entities.description: The House Cup is mentioned as an award that Gryffindor had a chance to win but lost due to the 150 points.

relationships.description: Gryffindor has Harry Potter as a student.
Gryffindor has Neville as a student.
Harry Potter is part of Gryffindor house.
Neville is part of Gryffindor house.
